text.section: The owner of the Bowie Race Course Training Center shall operate the Center as a thoroughbred training facility to provide more stall space for a race meeting that a licensee holds.
The owner of the Bowie Race Course Training Center is responsible for the cost to improve, maintain, and operate the Center.
